content: Digital Health/HealthIT startup seeking to hire/bring on board a healthcare interoperability and integration engineer. Responsibility would be to oversee/help develop the technology’s connections to private physician practice’s EMR‘s and health insurance carriers to allow for provider/ patient interactions and other bundled services. Developer should be familiar with all relevant industry standards including HL7, FHIR and Vendor API’s. Software developer experience and product/project manager experience is preferable. The individual would carry the title and responsibility of CTO. Ability to work remotely from anywhere in the US. US citizenship not required. For more information pls contact noamkurtis@gmail.com
